text.section:
The Department shall issue to the General Assembly, in accordance with § 2-1246 of the State Government Article:
a preliminary report 6 months after the Program is initially activated for each disaster; and
a final report on or before 18 months after the Program is initially activated for each disaster.

The reports shall include:
the amount and type of assistance provided;
the counties in which the assistance was provided; and
the names of any financial institutions that provided assistance under the Program.
